amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds with respect to specified States, to penalize a financial institution solely because the institution provides financial services to an entity that is a manufacturer, producer, or a person that participates in any business or organized activity that involves handling marijuana or marijuana products and engages in such activity pursuant to a law established by a State or local government and engages in such activity pursuant to a law established by a State or local government.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Heck (WA) amendment (A034) Agreed to by recorded vote: 231 - 192 (Roll no. 418).
